reviews.review:
这是个傻逼游戏 不推荐
我竟然因为骚扰被被游戏封禁一段时间？？？这简直是可笑，你们的系统或审核人员不去处理那些开外挂或是故意恶意游戏的玩家，反而对正常且支持这游戏的玩家进行处罚。我积极游戏，遇见恶意玩家且无可奈何，我还不能抱怨？那些玩家让我忍受一整局长达接近30分钟的糟糕游戏体验，而当这局游戏结束之后我抱怨你们还要处罚我？有人可能会问为什么我不直接离开游戏，那我凭什么要为了离开游戏承受5分钟的惩罚呢? 匹配机制给我不仅是游戏技术糟糕的队友，更多是游戏态度糟糕的队友，这种情况下不让我发表我的情绪？
This game is highly NOT recommended.
I was banned from the game for a while because of harassment? ? ?
This is really ridiculous, the DBD system or reviewers don't deal with players who play cheating or toxic games, but punish normal players who really support the game and play in a positive way. I actively play games, but when I meet toxic players and there is nothing I can do, why I can't complain? Those players made me endure a pretty bad game experience that lasted nearly 30 minutes, and when the game was over I complained that you guys still gave me penalty? Someone may ask why I don't just leave the game. Why should I suffer a 5-minute penalty for leaving the game because someone is toxic? The casual matching gives me not only teammates with bad game skills, but also teammates with toxic attitude. Under this kind of circumstances the DBD don't let me complain after the game.
gerilimi sevenler için güzel oyun

Changed my review to not recommended: you get disconnected constantly, and when that happens you lose multiplayer rank progress, get locked out of the queue for a while, and lose the blood points (the free progression currency) you had earned. 

I basically only get disconnected from this one specific game, and sometimes it will happen 4 or 5 nights in a row. There are various bugs people can use to crash the game when they lose, or break the game and teleport around.

The customer support is just bots so nothing gets better. New content makes the game look healthy, but it's not.

Old Review:

As a killer, the game lets you play in a way that emphasizes whatever balance of mechanical skill and strategic thinking that suits you best. 

As a survivor, there seems to be a social component to balance as well. The streamers for this game have made oodles of drama videos against each other, so that might be the real challenge.

I recommend playing a killer, since people on the internet are terrible.

不建议新人玩屠夫，你一开始可能觉得四杀不难，但是分高了到后面就是高强度对局了，你玩的难受心累对面四个人类可能就是一般心态，毕竟四人车队多简单，人皇遍地走但是屠皇又不是经常能遇到，那些恶心的车队就应该匹到屠皇局而不是瞎几把匹配。
四人车队就全是一个人溜三个人速修，大部分时候还遇到四个人又会溜又会修，挂一个人的收益根本赶不上对面语音交流分工配合来的快，隐藏分上去了室内图匹的还多，玩个护士对面就喜欢卡视野还人手一个钢筋打击我是真觉得恶心，车队就nm不能设置成共享点数分配技能吗，技能不要总是那一套恶心屠夫，人类有强的技能可以再获得重来的机会，但这样对屠夫有多绝望,屠夫失误一次都可能再被拖很久的时间。

This game either makes you feel like the biggest brain mastermind that's ever lived or the most pathetic creature to ever walk the earth but its so addicting that you keep coming back to roll the dice

Pros:
-Horror fans get to play as/against iconic survivors and killers
-Can play with/against random players, friends, or both
-Variety of perks/strategies to play with, which makes every match feel a bit different from the last
-Decent graphics that have only improved with time

Cons:
-Can be buggy at times
-Random players can sandbag/have bad manners
-The licensed chapters/characters cost money (which is to be expected)
-Cosmetics can be pricey

I've been playing Dead by Daylight for years on both Xbox and now PC. Despite the flaws, I always enjoy playing it whether I'm alone or with friends. I definitely recommend picking it up if you're a horror fan!

(cosx)' = - sinx
(tanx)'=1/(cosx)^2=(secx)^2=1+(tanx)^2
-(cotx)'=1/(sinx)^2=(cscx)^2=1+(cotx)^2
(secx)'=tanx·secx
(cscx)'=-cotx·cscx
(arcsinx)'=1/(1-x^2)^1/2
(arccosx)'=-1/(1-x^2)^1/2
(arctanx)'=1/(1+x^2)
(arccotx)'=-1/(1+x^2)
(arcsecx)'=1/(|x|(x^2-1)^1/2)
(arccscx)'=-1/(|x|(x^2-1)^1/2)
④(sinhx)'=coshx
(coshx)'=sinhx
(tanhx)'=1/(coshx)^2=(sechx)^2
(coth)'=-1/(sinhx)^2=-(cschx)^2
(sechx)'=-tanhx·sechx
(cschx)'=-cothx·cschx
(arsinhx)'=1/(x^2+1)^1/2
(arcoshx)'=1/(x^2-1)^1/2
(artanhx)'=1/(x^2-1) (|x|<1)
(arcothx)'=1/(x^2-1) (|x|>1)

Az egyik legtoxikusabb közösség ami létezik a gaming-ben. Teabag, bully-ing minden amit el tudsz képzelni. A gameplay faék egyszerű, de a killer 4 stack ellen esélytelen, legalábbis magasabb rankokon. Survivorként nyomod az M1-et és menekülsz, egy idő után unalmas lesz. Balansz mint olyan, az nem volt, nincs, és soha nem is lesz egy ilyen játékban.
Az egyetlen ami jó a játékban, az a design, a licencelt killerek.

Kérdezheted, akkor honnan a 200 óra játkidőm? Nyugi haver, PS4-en még több van. A Játék addiktív tud lenni, mert hiszel benne, hogy egyszer lesz normális balansz, letiltják a nyomorult survivor second chance perkeket, nem lesz tunneling, campelés stb. De nem, jönnek a boon-ok, a végtelen healing a survivoroknek, még több nonszensz. És egy idő után kiégsz mint egy villanykörte.

Insanely addictive, if one can get past the towering new-player experience, progression grind and sometimes toxic community. The mashup of different horror franchises across media makes for an attractive exterior, with a surprising amount of depth to the (literal) gameplay Loops of Survivors and the intricacies of each Killer. Be prepared to either be put off by the ridiculous amount of information, perks and mechanics thrown at new players, or be hooked by playing either role.

I have played 300 hours of this game on console, and decided to upgrade to PC but I soon realized that I have a love/hate relationship with this game. Playing with friends is the most fun you will ever have with this game as survivor queue times are long, and playing killer is frustrating. This game also has an absurd amount of bugs since updates tend to remove an issue, while adding two more. Until Behavior starts focusing on the health of the game instead of releasing DLC every 3 months, Dead by Daylight will be just another fantastic concept held back by a greedy company.

This game can be a ton of fun, it just has some hiccups on occasion. At the time of this review, I am getting close to having played 200 hours, so overall not a ton but don't take that as me not knowing the game.
I don't have many problems, but I do have a few. The main thing I run into are killers/survivors who ruin the entire experience. Instead of playing the game, they find ways to "win" in a way that feels almost like cheating. Survivors will form a full team where they talk and coordinate on discord or something. That's fine! But when this team purposely offer things and bring items and perks designed to make it impossible for the killer to do anything, then it's not very cool anymore. Even though killers cant bring in a group of friends, they have their own tactics. Usually "camping" a hook making it to where a survivor dies right at the start and can't do anything about it, or "tunneling" which just fuels frustration. There is no way to easily fix that, but some of the devs just don't seem to care which sucks.
That's all of the negative, mostly just people being people. There are a ton of players who are great to play with/against and they can make the game even better. I heavily recommend the game to anyone who likes the multiplayer horror genre, even if it's not a ton of horror. Heck, I recommend the game to anyone who likes games!
Some friendly advice though, if someone is toxic in a game towards you, just toss it off as nothing. If you take it to heart and act toxic in your next game because of it, that doesn't help.

Otherwise, 9/10 won't stop playing anytime soon.
kinda boring. a lot of killers let u just farm xp and farm xp themselves, no chance to play out the game.

Well, let's start with parameters that will be matter for almost any player: Gameplay
Overall, when you start playing this game you can have a lot of fun: you can experiment with different perks, open new survivors and killers, play with your friends. In your first game you'll be scared (100% sure). But after playing a while you will notice subtle [u]cheaters[/u] that ruin your game. Behaviour is not going to change this because they said they don't see a problem with that. Okay, moving to community.

[b]Toxic survivors or killers[/b]. If you will play more, then you will have higher ranks and this is the point where you will see t-bags or facecamping in every 2-3 games. If you're unlucky, then be prepared for insults in post-game chat. At first, you might consider this offensive or annoying, but you have to remember that these people just angry. If you can deal with all this stuff, then i will talk about things that finally will make you exhausted.

[i]Servers[/i]. As much as i know, your hits(or escapes) will go through validation from the server that decides whether your get hit or not. And most of the time, if the survivor use dead hard(David King's perk), then your hit is not going to be consider as down state for the survivor. In other words, survivors using dead hard can just escape your hit and continuing to run, even when you saw blood and heard their screams. You can think that this is not going to be a big problem, but at least 1 survivor in every match use it(mostly, it's minimum 2). 

How i see this game over the time? For me it's getting boring. People use the same meta perks(both survivors and killers) and even if you will use some fun perks - you will lose because the other side don't think the same way you do. For some reason, Behaviour starting  to realize only [b]now[/b] that there's a perks that waaaay stronger than others. And this is the perks that you will see in every single game. 
Right now I have fun only playing in custom game because custom game with friends(who aren't tryhards) looks like what this game was supposed to be - entertaining, scary and unpredictable. Sadly, it's not. It's own community(with a little help of work team) that destroying any fun both sides can have in this game.

fun game even though hitboxes can be weird. matchmaking is also strange, you can "win" a game against a completly new player and in the next one you are paired up with top tier players, it gets better the more you play, I'd say in about 5-10 matches it starts to find players that are actually close to your skill level. Although it's a "horror" game it doesn't feel like one after some time playing.
